ygData.subject: Price gouging
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I know we have a suggested list, and I know that they are cheap to make, but I have been selling fireworks for 1pp EACH and making a fortune.  Since the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I know we have a suggested list, and I know that they are cheap to make, but I have been selling fireworks for 1pp EACH and making a fortune. Since the change to the graphics I can't make enough of them! Just walk into a group of high levels, set two of them off and voila instant sales! Alos been selling my services as fireworks and high diving gnome - with safe fall looks pretty spectacular!

So if they hand you crushed apples, make cider !

Ztirnats
Crazed Tinkerer of Karana
